name: Sapper Corps
description:
Important note: This is the first Alpha Test Demo of Sapper Corps! It may contain bugs and other issues.

Welcome to the Sapper Corps! Your decisions will determine the outcome of the war as we march on the northlands! For the King!

Sapper Corps is an upcoming PC game that takes the concepts and components of an RTS game, but limits the player’s control to a single unit, changing the gameplay mechanics from a battle commander’s grand strategy to an action/adventure game that adds unique combat mechanics and battle strategies to secure and control key locations on battle maps.

The player gathers resources, builds military structures (to deploy troops and defend bases) and fights in large scale battle zones. The player has to secure key locations on battle maps in order to win missions and progress in a story driven campaign.
